title: LG announces 2022 gram lineup with 12th-gen Intel processors and optional discrete GPUs
content:
LG has announced the full 2022 lineup of gram laptops for international markets, a few weeks after their launch in South Korea. The 2022 LG gram lineup includes a total of seven devices, including four clamshell laptops, two convertibles, and the new gram +view portable monitor. The new LG gram laptops are all powered by

The post LG announces 2022 gram lineup with 12th-gen Intel processors and optional discrete GPUs appeared first on XDA.
description: LG has announced that its 2022 gram lineup of laptops is coming to markets around the world soon, alongside a 16-inch portable monitor.
